name: Baby Blindness
description:
This game was made in two days for the NightJam#1 and followed the themes of "I don't remember" and "Light is blinding". As a baby that is going blind from the light, you must find your glasses by venturing through a dungeon and defeating zombies all while conserving your sight so you don't go blind for good.

Light is Blinding: The baby is literally going blind from opening it's eyes.

I don't remember: You must try and remember the layout of the level in order to not run into enemies or spikes.

WASD - Move 

Up Right Down Left - Attack

Space Bar -  to See

Baby needs the glasses!
